name: Alchemist's Acid
text: The glass vial containing alchemist’s acid can withstand the corrosive liquid but easily shatters upon impact. The volatile acid explodes when the flask is broken, corroding anything in its way.  Modification: Ammunition (level + 1). You create this item for use with a ranged weapon such as a bow, a crossbow, or a sling. Item’s range becomes the range of the weapon but continues to use the indicated attack modifier. You do not include a weapon’s proficiency bonus or enhancement bonus in the attack. The item’s component cost corresponds to the table below.
flavorText: When shattered, this glass vial releases a spray of acid.
